trans-unit.source: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.
trans-unit.target: 使用遮罩區別適當及不適當的使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: The MaskedTextBox class is an enhanced <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextBox 類別已增強<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>支援宣告式語法，接受或拒絕使用者的輸入控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, you can specify the following input without writing any custom validation logic in your application: - Required input characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，您可以指定下列項目而不需要撰寫任何自訂驗證邏輯應用程式中輸入:-必要輸入的字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Optional input characters.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: - The type of input expected at a given position in the mask; for example, a digit, or an alphabetic or alphanumeric character.
trans-unit.target: 輸入遮罩; 中的指定位置必須是-類型例如，數字或字母或英數字元。

trans-unit.source: - Mask literals, or characters that should appear directly in the MaskedTextBox; for example, the hyphens (-) in a phone number, or the currency symbol in a price.
trans-unit.target: -遮罩常值或字元應直接出現在 MaskedTextBox;例如，在電話號碼或在價格的貨幣符號的連字號 （-）。

trans-unit.source: - Special processing for input characters; for example, to convert alphabetic characters to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: -特殊處理的輸入字元。例如，若要轉換成大寫的字母字元。

trans-unit.source: When a MaskedTextBox control is displayed at run time, it represents the mask as a series of prompt characters and optional literal characters.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextBox 控制項在執行階段顯示時，它會表示為一系列的提示字元和選擇性的常值字元遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Each editable mask position, representing a required or optional input, is shown with a single prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 代表必要或選擇性的輸入，每個可編輯的遮罩位置會以單一的提示字元中顯示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the number sign (#) is often used as a placeholder for a numeric character input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，數字符號 （#） 通常用於做為預留位置的數字字元的輸入。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A> property to specify a custom prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>屬性來指定自訂的提示字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.HidePromptOnLeave%2A> property determines if the user sees the prompt characters when the control loses input focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.HidePromptOnLeave%2A>屬性會決定是否使用者會看到提示字元，則當控制項失去輸入焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.HidePromptOnLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: As the user types input into the masked text box, valid input characters replace their respective prompt characters in a sequential fashion.
trans-unit.target: 在遮罩的文字方塊中，輸入使用者類型，有效的輸入的字元會取代其各自的提示字元，以循序方式。

trans-unit.source: If the user types an invalid input character, no replacement occurs, but instead a beep is issued if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A> property is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入無效的輸入的字元，如果沒有替代項目，就會發生，但如果要改為發出嗶聲<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>屬性設定為`true`，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can provide your own custom error logic by handing this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由處理這個事件來提供您自己的自訂錯誤邏輯。

trans-unit.source: When the current insertion point is at a literal character, the user has a number of options: - If a character other than the prompt character is typed, the literal will automatically be skipped and the input character will be applied to the next editable position, represented by the next prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的插入點位於常值字元時，使用者有許多選項:-如果其他字元超出輸入提示字元，常值將會自動略過而輸入的字元將會套用至下一個可編輯的位置，以表示下一步 提示字元。

trans-unit.source: - If the prompt character is typed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property is true, the input will overtype the prompt character and insertion point will be moved to the next position in the mask.
trans-unit.target: -如果輸入提示字元而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>屬性為 true，輸入將會取代提示字元並插入點將會移至遮罩中的下一個位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: - As is always the case, the arrow keys can be used to navigate to a previous or subsequent position.
trans-unit.target: -為一律是這樣，方向鍵可用來瀏覽至之前或之後的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A> property to verify whether or not the user has entered all of the required input.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>屬性，確認是否在使用者已輸入所有必要的輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property will always retrieve the user's input formatted according to the mask and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性一律會擷取使用者輸入的格式是根據遮罩和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MaskedTextBox control actually defers all mask processing to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName> class specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextBox 控制項實際上會延後所有遮罩處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>所指定類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This standard provider supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property can be used to restrict input to the characters sets a-z, A-Z, and 0-9.
trans-unit.target: 此標準提供者支援 surrogate 除外的所有 Unicode 字元，並以垂直方式合併字元;不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性可以用來限制字元組 a-z，A-Z、 0-9 的輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Masks do not necessarily guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type; for example, -9 could be entered for an age in years.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩並不一定保證使用者的輸入，將代表給定的類型; 有效的值例如，無法輸入歲數-9。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that a user's input represents a valid value by assigning an instance of that value's type to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者的輸入代表有效的值，藉由指定該實值型別執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can detect whether the user removes focus from MaskedTextBox when it contains an invalid value by monitoring for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以偵測是否使用者移除焦點 MaskedTextBox 藉由監視包含無效的值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: If type validation succeeds, the object representing the value will be available through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別驗證成功，表示值的物件可透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs>參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, several common keyboard shortcuts do not work with MaskedTextBox.
trans-unit.target: 如同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，數個通用的鍵盤快速鍵不使用 MaskedTextBox。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In particular, CTRL-R (right justify text), CTRL-L (left justify text), and CTRL-L (center text) have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，CTRL-R （靠右對齊文字），CTRL-L （靠左對齊文字），CTRL-L （center 文字） 會有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0 MaskedTextBox was designed to retain most of the functionality of the Masked Edit control in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 6.0 MaskedTextBox 與相容性設計用來保留大部分的遮罩編輯控制項的功能[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]6.0。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists common properties on the Masked Edit control and gives their equivalents on MaskedTextBox.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出遮罩編輯控制項上的通用屬性，並提供 MaskedTextBox 其對等用法。

trans-unit.source: |Masked Edit control ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0) property|Equivalent MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) property| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`AllowPrompt` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>| |`AutoTab` property|None| |`ClipMode` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A>| |`ClipText` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat>)| |`Format` property|None| |`FormattedText` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat>)| |`Mask` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>| |`PromptChar` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>| |`PromptInclude` property|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ResetOnPrompt%2A>| |`ValidationError` event|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>| > [!CAUTION] > The MaskedTextBox control does not support multiline configuration or undo functionality.
trans-unit.target: |遮罩編輯控制項 ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0) 屬性 |對等 MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) 屬性 | |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`AllowPrompt`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>| |`AutoTab`屬性 |None | |`ClipMode`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A>| |`ClipText`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>（當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat>） | |`Format`屬性 |None | |`FormattedText`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>（當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat>） | |`Mask`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>| |`PromptChar`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>| |`PromptInclude`屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ResetOnPrompt%2A>| |`ValidationError`事件 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>| > [!CAUTION] > MaskedTextBox 控制項不支援多行組態或復原功能。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ResetOnPrompt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, while the members associated with these features have been retained for compatibility with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> base class, their implementations perform no actions.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這些功能與相關聯的成員時保留相容性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>基底類別，它們的實作未執行任何動作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> class using defaults.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>類別使用的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The default MaskedTextBox constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property to a null mask, represented by the string "<>".
trans-unit.target: 預設 MaskedTextBox 建構函式集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性為 null 的遮罩，由字串"<>"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: A null mask will accept any combination of characters as input.
trans-unit.target: Null 遮罩將會接受做為輸入字元的任意組合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> class using the specified custom mask language provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>類別使用的指定自訂的遮罩語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: The `maskedTextProvider` parameter defines the masking language used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: `maskedTextProvider`參數會定義使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>的遮罩語言

trans-unit.source: It is responsible for parsing the mask and determining whether user input conforms to the current mask position.
trans-unit.target: 它負責剖析此遮罩，以及決定使用者輸入是否符合目前的遮罩位置。

trans-unit.source: You can derive a new class from <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName> to define your own custom masking language, and use the MaskedTextBox constructor to replace the standard <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>定義您自己自訂的遮罩語言，並使用 MaskedTextBox 建構函式來取代標準<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>衍生新類別

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the default masking language and supply your own input mask, you do not need to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用預設的遮罩語言，並提供您自己的輸入的遮罩，您不需要使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can either use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, or use the default constructor then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式或使用預設建構函式將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: A custom mask language provider, derived from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的遮罩語言提供者，衍生自<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: maskedTextProvider is .
trans-unit.target: maskedTextProvideris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> class using the specified input mask.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>類別使用指定的輸入的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The MaskedTextBox constructor uses the standard <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName> with the input `mask` to parse user input into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextBox 建構函式會使用標準<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>與輸入`mask`剖析使用者輸入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a new mask to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, it will override the value set by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派新的遮罩，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，則會覆寫這個建構函式所設定的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the input mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表輸入的遮罩。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask*>

trans-unit.source: mask is .
trans-unit.target: maskis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining how TAB keys are handled for multiline configurations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，以便判斷如何針對多行組態處理 TAB 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不支援<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AcceptsTab property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: AcceptsTab 屬性被繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab*>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 不會引發這個事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AcceptsTabChanged event is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: AcceptsTabChanged 事件都被繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this event is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*> can be entered as valid data by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>可以由使用者輸入有效的資料。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can enter the prompt character into the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以在控制項中，輸入提示字元否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control accepts characters outside of the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控制項接受外部 ASCII 字元集的字元。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, AsciiOnly restricts user input to the characters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，AsciiOnly 會限制使用者的輸入字元 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z。

trans-unit.source: ASCII control characters are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許 ASCII 控制字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if only ASCII is accepted; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control can accept any arbitrary Unicode character.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether literals and prompt characters are copied to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定是否會將常值和提示字元複製到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: The CutCopyMaskFormat property determines how text, selected within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control, is interpreted when it is copied to the clipboard or retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SelectedText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: CutCopyMaskFormat 屬性會決定如何將文字選取內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項，複製到剪貼簿或透過擷取時，會解譯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SelectedText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SelectedText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it determines whether literal characters, prompt characters, or both are included when selected text is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它會判斷是否常值字元、 提示字元，或兩者都包含存取選取的文字時。

trans-unit.source: When prompt characters are excluded, they are transformed into spaces in the copied string.
trans-unit.target: 當提示字元會被排除時，它們會轉換成所複製字串中的空格。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> property serves a similar purpose with respect to how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>屬性有類似的用途，相對於如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性會被解譯。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>

trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>時隱藏<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>沒有焦點，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text insertion mode of the masked text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定遮罩的文字方塊控制項的文字插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The InsertKeyMode property controls the character insertion behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: InsertKeyMode 屬性控制字元插入的行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The state of this property is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> enumeration, which can be always on, always off or set to respect the setting of the user's keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的狀態由定義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>列舉型別，可以永遠是 on，一律會關閉，或設尊重使用者的鍵盤設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>

trans-unit.source: This property supersedes the insertion mode of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取代鍵盤的插入模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the keyboard is set to overwrite, but InsertKeyMode is set to `Insert`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will operate in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果鍵盤設定為覆寫，但 InsertKeyMode 設`Insert`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>會在插入模式下運作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> property will access the true insertion mode of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>屬性會存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>的則為 true 的插入模式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If changing InsertKeyMode changes the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更 InsertKeyMode 變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if no mask has been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有遮罩已設定，此屬性任何作用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"></xref> value that indicates the current insertion mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"> </xref>值，指出目前的插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"></xref> value was supplied when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 無效的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode"></xref>設定這個屬性時提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是輸入的按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是輸入的按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether new user input overwrites existing input.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定新的使用者輸入是否覆寫現有的輸入。

trans-unit.source: IsOverwriteMode takes into account both the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> property and the state of the user's keyboard.
trans-unit.target: IsOverwriteMode 列入考量的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>屬性和使用者的鍵盤的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> is set to either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>, IsOverwriteMode will return `false` or `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>會設為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>，將會傳回 IsOverwriteMode`false`或`true`分別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>, it will return the state of the INSERT key.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>，它會傳回插入的索引鍵的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When IsOverwriteMode is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will reject as invalid any character entry that would result in a violation anywhere in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 當 IsOverwriteMode 是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>將會拒絕當做無效遮罩中的任何位置發生違規將會產生任何字元項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: In explanation, if inserting a character would cause a character to be shifted over into a mask position where it would not be valid, the character insertion will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 說明，在插入字元，就會發生要移位到位置不是有效的遮罩位置的字元插入字元將會遭到拒絕。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> will overwrite existing characters as the user enters new ones; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> will shift existing characters forward.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>將會覆寫現有的字元，在使用者輸入新的;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>將向右移向前復原現有的字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.String> that contains a single line.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref:System.String>包含單行。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input mask to use at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在執行階段使用的輸入的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the current mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表目前的遮罩。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string which allows any input.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的字串，它可允許任何輸入。

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the Mask property is not a valid mask.
trans-unit.target: 輸入遮罩屬性的字串不是有效的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Invalid masks include masks containing non-printable characters.
trans-unit.target: 無效的遮罩包含遮罩，其中包含不可列印字元。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the input mask is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入的遮罩已變更之後。

trans-unit.source: The MaskChanged event is raised after the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: MaskChanged 引發之後的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is also raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> is indirectly altered by a member such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果也會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>間接成員例如更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required inputs have been entered into the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要的輸入是否已經輸入到輸入遮罩。

trans-unit.source: MaskCompleted checks only required input elements.
trans-unit.target: MaskCompleted 檢查必要的輸入的元素。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all required and optional input elements have been filled in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否所有必要和選擇性的輸入項目已填入，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required input has been entered into the mask; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有必要的輸入已輸入遮罩。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a clone of the mask provider associated with this instance of the masked text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與遮罩的文字方塊控制項的這個執行個體相關聯的遮罩提供者的複製品。

trans-unit.source: The MaskedTextProvider property defines the mask-parsing engine and the masking language used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextProvider 屬性定義的遮罩剖析引擎和所使用的遮罩語言<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The default provider is the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName> class; however, a custom provider can be specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 預設提供者是<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>類別; 不過，自訂提供者也可以指定使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MaskedTextProvider cannot be set directly.
trans-unit.target: MaskedTextProvider 無法直接設定。

trans-unit.source: However, setting some of the properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>—may internally cause the creation of a new MaskedTextProvider.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有些屬性的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>— 例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>— 在內部會導致建立新的 MaskedTextProvider。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: A masking language provider of type MaskedTextProvider.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩類型 MaskedTextProvider 的語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required and optional inputs have been entered into the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要和選擇性的輸入是否已經輸入到輸入遮罩。

trans-unit.source: You can use the MaskFull property within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event handler to determine if the user's input was rejected because there are no remaining inputs in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 MaskFull 屬性內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件處理常式，以判斷使用者的輸入是否遭到拒絕，因為有沒有剩餘的輸入遮罩中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether only required input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已經輸入必要的輸入的元素，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required and optional inputs have been entered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已輸入所有必要和選擇性的輸入值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user's input or assigned character does not match the corresponding format element of the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者的輸入或指派的字元不符合輸入遮罩的對應格式項目。

trans-unit.source: MaskInputRejected is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: MaskInputRejected 是預設事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The MaskInputRejected event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask.
trans-unit.target: MaskInputRejected 事件發生於輸入遮罩已拒絕的字元。

trans-unit.source: The input mask, represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的遮罩，由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，來與控制項關聯的遮罩的文字方塊提供者解譯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: MaskInputRejected is raised in the following situations: - An input character does not match the corresponding format element.
trans-unit.target: 在下列情況中將會引發 MaskInputRejected:-輸入的字元不符合對應的格式項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user enters an alphabetic character when a digit is required.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可以輸入字母的字元數字時所需。

trans-unit.source: This is probably the most common reason why this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是最常見的原因為何會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: - The user is trying to input extraneous characters beyond the end of the mask either because the mask has already been filled or the current caret position has been moved to the very end of the displayed input mask string.
trans-unit.target: -使用者嘗試輸入遮罩的結尾有多餘的字元可能是因為遮罩已滿，或目前的插入號位置已經移至顯示的輸入的遮罩字串的結尾。

trans-unit.source: - A paste operation either inserts a character that does not match its associated format element, or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> property is `false`, it shifts existing characters into new positions where they do not match their format elements.
trans-unit.target: -貼上作業是插入的字元不符合其相關聯的格式項目，或如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>屬性是`false`，它會轉換為新的位置，它們不符合其格式項目位置的現有的字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A cut operation shifts existing characters to the left, and one or more characters do not match their newly associated format elements.
trans-unit.target: -剪下的作業會將現有的字元向左，及一或多個字元不符合其相關新的格式項目。

trans-unit.source: - An assignment was made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property and the assigned string caused one or more mask violations.
trans-unit.target: -設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性和指定的字串造成一或多個遮罩違規。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a string was assigned to the control that causes MaskInputRejected to occur, no part of the string will appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串已指派給會造成發生 MaskInputRejected 控制項中，字串的任何部分會不出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The default handling for MaskInputRejected will play a beep sound if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設處理 MaskInputRejected 播放嗶聲的聲音如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is often handled to implement custom error handling, for example, to move to the next user input control if the mask is full, or to display a custom error dialog box or ToolTip if the input character is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於實作自訂錯誤處理，例如、 移至下一步的使用者輸入的控制項，如果遮罩已滿，或顯示自訂錯誤 對話方塊或工具提示，如果輸入的字元無效。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的使用者能夠輸入或貼入文字方塊控制項的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不支援<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs> class for information about how to determine the maximum length of a string in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs>如需有關如何判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>字串的最大的長度資訊的類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs>中</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>，請參閱

trans-unit.source: This property always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一律傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is not fully supported by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不完全支援<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A> property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A>屬性被繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this property is not fully supported; it cannot be set and it always resolves to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態、 不完全支援這個屬性，則無法設定，並永遠會解析為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Typically occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Multiline*> property has changed; however, this event is not raised by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 通常會發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Multiline*>屬性已變更; 不過，會引發這個事件不由<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Multiline*>

trans-unit.source: The MultilineChanged event is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: MultilineChanged 事件都被繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this event is not implemented in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>中不會實作此事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>
